channel.title: [delta]some magic spell modifications[delta]
channel.description: so im trying to modify some magic spells, for example on the spellbook interface, i want it not to say "air strike" but something else, how do i change that? and how do i make a spell so it hits multiple ppl (lets say in a 2x2 area)

item.title: [delta]some magic spell modifications[delta]
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Ix Soulcist xI:

1. You have to look in TextHandler.Java.

already did that, hasnt worked
lemme try again
nope
i just searched the enitre source and entire client, there was no “wind strike” anywere.
could someone at least help me with my other question about mutli
i found ice barrage multi code, could someone explain it too me so i can change that to different areas? (example 2 x 2 squares)
